mapper.select: SELECT t2.channel_id, t1.promotion_id, t1.num_iid, t1.tejiabao_id, t2.product_code, t2.product_sku, IFNULL(t2.promotion_price, '') AS promotion_price FROM ( SELECT a.promotion_id, b.tejiabao_id, a.num_iid FROM voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_task_tejiabao a, ( SELECT id as promotion_id, tejiabao_id FROM voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_promotion WHERE channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND active = 1 AND promotion_status = 0 AND cart_id = #{cartId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tejiabao_id != 0 ) b WHERE syn_flg = 1 AND task_type = 0 AND a.promotion_id = b.promotion_id AND num_iid != '' GROUP BY promotion_id, num_iid LIMIT 0,200 ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT prom.channel_id, sku.promotion_id, sku.product_code, sku.product_sku, `code`.num_iid, `code`.promotion_price FROM voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_promotion_skus sku LEFT JOIN voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_promotion_codes `code` ON sku.promotion_id = `code`.promotion_id AND sku.product_code = `code`.product_code LEFT JOIN voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_promotion prom ON sku.promotion_id = prom.id ) t2 ON t1.promotion_id = t2.promotion_id AND t1.num_iid = t2.num_iid
